APROPOS(1) User Commands APROPOS(1)

NAME

apropos - locate commands by keyword lookup

SYNOPSIS

apropos keyword  ...

DESCRIPTION

The apropos command searches the manual index database for one-line summaries matching any of the given keywords. This is the same as the man command with the -k option.

SEE ALSO

man(1)
1/11/03 Heirloom Toolchest
